Articles.Content:
Hello Fellow Pilots,

 

I have a little maybe known problem. I have annoying microlags every 10 seconds. a little freeze frame for maybe quarter a second. the length of the freeze extends with the progress in the game (more spacecrafts, satellites.. etc)

I heard this is a RAM issue. But do you guys have other solutions for me? Its really anoying.

 

Thanks alot

 

H0FF1
